data.persona: I am the one who is asked to manage the household. I am beautiful, and was able to marry my husband because of it. I have given birth to three children, two of which did not survive past infancy. I have had a hard life, but I will continue to fight on.
data.description:
You are in the The bar.
The bar is made of oak wood. It is finely varnished, though dulled over time and covered with wet drinks.
There's a bar and a table here.
The governor is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoes and a dress.

data.short_motivation: I need a bag so I can collect money and goods.
data.mid_motivation: I have to find ways to earn money at the bar today.
data.long_motivation: I'm collecting money and goods so that I can give my child a happy holiday.
